ARABIC: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: except from their wives or those they own as slaves, in which case they are not blameworthy;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Except from their wives and women slaves of old are free of blame,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: save from their wives, or those whom their right hands possess; for with regard to them they are free from blame "
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: except with their spouses and slave-girls. The practice of carnal relations is lawful with them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Except from their wives or the legal bondwomen that they possess, for then there is no blame upon them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Except from their wives or their right hand possessions, for then, they are free from blame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Except before their mates or those whom their right hands possess, for they surely are not blameable,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: save from their wives and what their right hands own then being not blameworthy
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Save from their wives or the (slaves) that their right hands possess, for then they are not blameworthy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: except with their wives, and what their right hands possess -- for then they are free from blame,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Save in regard to their spouses and those whom their right hands own: so they are not blameworthy-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: (except from their spouses or their slave women, for then they are not blameworthy;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Except with those joined to them in the marriage bond, or (the captives) whom their right hands possess,- for (in their case) they are free from blame,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Except from their wives or (the captives and slaves) that their right hands possess, for then, they are free from blame;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: except with their wives and what their right hand possess, and then they are not blamed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Except from their spouses, or their dependents—for then they are free from blame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they will not be blamed -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:6] except from their spouses, that is, to their spouses, and what [slaves] their right hands possess, that is, concubines, for then they are not blameworthy, in having sexual intercourse with them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Save from their wives) up to four wives (or the (slaves) that their right hands possess) without any limit in number, (for then they are not blameworthy) when they engage in that which is lawful,
